name: Treefender (werignac, manglemix)
description:
Defend yourself against an onslaught of woodpeckers, beavers, lumberjacks, and the manifestation of Fall itself.

Controls:

Drag from the top of the tree to shoot acorns at incoming enemies.

Enemies close to you will deal damage.

Credits:

Art: Aina Gadzhieva

Sound Design: Kobi Baker

Writer: Wyatt Bruchhauser

Programmers: Najman Husaini - Menuing and Sound Control, Blake Rudman - Controls and Sound Effect Management, William Erignac - Game Logic and Art Implementation
